## rds-icon Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                          | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `alt`    | `alt`     | <span style="color:red">**[DEPRECATED]**</span> Set the alternative text of the icon<br/><br/>                                       | `string` | `undefined` |
| `color`  | `color`   | <span style="color:red">**[DEPRECATED]**</span> Sets the color of the icon. Setting no color will inherit from its parent.<br/><br/> | `string` | `undefined` |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | <span style="color:red">**[DEPRECATED]**</span> Set the name of the icon to implement<br/><br/>                                      | `string` | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | <span style="color:red">**[DEPRECATED]**</span> Set the size of the icon. Values: md (16x16), lg (24x24), xlg (32x32)<br/><br/>      | `string` | `'md'`      |


### Dependencies
